name: Better Together (Skillerabren)
description:
Better Together is my submission to the 5th BrackeysGameJam: 2021.1, with the Theme "Stronger Together"! You can play alone or with a friend!
Thanks for playing!
(Edit: i derped and didnt submit the game to the jam D:)

Controls:
Player1: WASD
Player2: Arrows
Grab Box:  Down

(Disclaimer: Resetting resets the whole game :P)
